## ActivityHistory type

Representing data of the Activity History. This is the part of "ProcessHistory".

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ActivityHistory = Activity & {
    ActivityDefinitionTitle?: string;
    ActivityType?: ActivityType;
    ApprovalStatus?: Link;
    Description?: string;
};
```
